import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Card, Button, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../products"; const ProductPage = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id); return ( Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: INR{product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: INR {product.price} Availabilty: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out Of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductPage;
